IonoObservationDensityProfileQuasiParabo.description: /// A quasi-parabolic segment is the best-fit 3-parameter quasi-parabolas defined via A, B, C coefficients, f^2=A/r^2+B/r+C‚Äù. Usually 3 groups for E, F1, and F2 layers, but additional segments may be used to improve accuracy.

index.description:
The index of this segment in the list, from 1 to NumSegments.
Example: /// Example: 12
Constraints: No constraints specified.

rb.description:
Starting range of the segment, in kilometers from the Earth's center.
Example: /// Example: 6460.1
Constraints: No constraints specified.

re.description:
Ending range of the segment, in kilometers from the Earth's center.
Example: /// Example: 6480.001
Constraints: No constraints specified.

a.description:
Coefficient A.
Example: /// Example: -550273940000
Constraints: No constraints specified.

b.description:
Coefficient B.
Example: /// Example: 169837632
Constraints: No constraints specified.

c.description:
Coefficient C.
Example: /// Example: 13104.63
Constraints: No constraints specified.

error.description:
Best-fit error.
Example: /// Example: 0.0016
Constraints: No constraints specified.
